intro: Introduce the reader to the experience and what they can learn.
username-placeholder: Placeholder text for username input element.
get-started: Button to start the year in review tool.
error-share: Error that occurs during the share process.
error-clipboard: Error that occurs if for some reason cannot access clipboard.
error-toomanyedits: The tool is restricted for editors with really high edit counts. This shows if they are detected.
thanks:
Shown on stats page at end for sharing

Parameters:
* $1 - number of thanks the user has given others
hny:
Wishes reader a happy year ahead.

Parameters:
* $1 - year after this one.
template-impact:
Shown on a dedicated card for template edit stats.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of templates the user has edited
appreciated-impact:
Shown on a dedicated card for thanks stats.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of thanks the user has received from others
appreciated-to-a:
The same as {{msg-wikimedia|wp-year-in-review-appreciated-to-b}}, but as a continuation of {{msg-wikimedia|wp-year-in-review-appreciated-impact}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of other users the user has thanked
appreciated-to-b:
Shown on a dedicated card for thanks stats. See also {{msg-wikimedia|wp-year-in-review-appreciated-to-a}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of other users the user has thanked
language-yoda: Label for English language in Yoda (Star Wars) speak
you-made-impact:
Shown on a dedicated card for the edits the user has made.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of edits the user has made
you-made-contributions-to-impact:
Sentence highlighting an article the user has made a contribution to.

Parameters:
* $1 - an article title (shown on a separate line)
and-impact:
Appears before titles for other articles the user has edited, as a continuation of {{msg-wikimedia|wp-year-in-review-you-made-contributions-to-impact}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - an article title (shown on a separate line)
you-uploaded-impact:
Sentence about the number of uploads the user has made.

Parameters:
$1 - number of files uploaded
talk-impact:
Shown on a dedicated card for the number of talk page contributions the user has made.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of talk page edits
no-contributions-impact:
Shown when no contributions found.

Parameters:
* $1 - a year (shown on a separate line)
edited-most-day-edit-total: in parentheses the number of edits you made on {{msg-wikimedia|wp-year-in-review-edited-most-day}}
time-afternoon: describes an editor who mostly edits in afternoon
time-morning: describes an editor who mostly edits in morning
time-lunch: describes an editor who mostly edits at lunchtime
time-sleep: describes an editor who mostly edits just before bedtime
time-night: describes an editor who mostly edits at night
time-early: describes an editor who mostly edits very early
time-evening: describes an editor who mostly edits in evenings
num-articles-impact:
Number of different articles the user has edited.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of edits
* $2 - number of different articles edited
gadgets-edits-impact:
Message about the number of edits the user has made to interface messages.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of edits
paragraphs:
Shown on a dedicated card about number of paragraphs edited.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of paragraphs edited
thanks-for-caring: Shown to people that thank other editors.
thank-fan-impact:
Message highlighting the person who thanked the user the most.

Parameters:
* $1 - username for the thanking user
thanked-most-impact:
Message highlighting the person the user thanked the most.

Parameters:
* $1 - username for the user who was thanked
most-edited-time-impact:
Describe when editing most likely occurs.

Parameters:
* $1 - a timeslot
share-text: Text representation of stats. All parameters are numbers.
generate-your-own:
Call to action to generate your own year in review.

Parameters:
* $1 - the URL to the Year in Review tool
thanked:
Parameters:
* $1 - number of times the user was thanked
badge-chatterbox: Label for badge for someone who talks a lot
badge-100: Badge label for someone who edited over 100 times
badge-1k: Badge label for someone who edited over 1,000 times
badge-10k: Badge label for someone who edited over 10,000 times
badge-100k: Badge label for someone who edited over 100,000 times
badge-1M: Badge label for someone who edited over 1 million times
badge-appreciated: Badge label for someone who appreciated people alot
badge-proofreader: Badge label for someone who transcribes books.
badge-template-wizard: Badge label for someone who makes templates (code)
badge-interface-hero: Badge label for someone who translates or writes code to support the software.
badge-day-desc: Tooltip, describes label of badge which has day of week.
badge-archivist: Badge label for someone who uploads lots of files
streak:
Message about how many days in a row the user has edited. The number will be shown on a separate line.

Parameters:
* $1 - a number
badge-streak: Badge label for someone who edits consistently
